Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities directly followed by \Payment Handled\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\ activities that lead to \Payment Handled\ within the same case.
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities with amounts above 100 euros.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities by \SYSTEM\ resource.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities grouped by \case:BudgetNumber\.
Metric: Frequency of activity '{}' grouped by the last value of case:BudgetNumber

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases where \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ occurred.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities over \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities that are not dismissed (considering all \Payment Handled\ as not dismissed for simplification).
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities in relation to the total number of activities in the event log.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases with \Payment Handled\ that also include \Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION\.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities that occur after \Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER\.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Total \Payment Handled\ activities performed by \SYSTEM\.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases with \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ over total \Payment Handled\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Occasions how often the \Payment Handled\ is performed after \Request Payment\.
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Payment Handled' for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: The ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases that follow the variant ending with \Payment Handled\ without any rejections.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases where \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ is followed by a resubmission of the declaration.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases exceeding the average performance time from \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ to \Payment Handled\.
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Payment Handled' for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs
